title: In Polarized Texas, Rare Agreement: Hispanic Mother, Melissa Lucio, Should Not Be Executed - The New York Times

description: The execution of Melissa Lucio would be the first of a Hispanic woman in Texas. New evidence casts doubt on her conviction.
